1.title: Curse of the Pixie Glade

episode of.title: Bearded Men Presents D&D: The Improvised Campaign (TV Series 2016– )

1.plot:

2.title: The Prince, the Pyrate, and the Dancing Owlbear II

episode of.title: Bearded Men Presents D&D: The Improvised Campaign (TV Series 2016– )

2.plot: On a quest to break the curse of The Hanged Man, Balthasar and Cade journey to the Isle of Mists in search of a magical chalice. But it would seem that there are forces on the island that would prefer to keep our heroes there for a long time. A LONG time.

3.title: Illusions of the Emerald Mage

episode of.title: Bearded Men Presents D&D: The Improvised Campaign (TV Series 2016– )

3.plot: The deep-seeded curse of a vampyre master called Ajax brought Vincent Von Dresdner to the hunt. On this particularly dangerous quest, however, Vincent may well learn that there are fates worse than death.

4.title: The Trials of Lyrandra

episode of.title: Bearded Men Presents D&D: The Improvised Campaign (TV Series 2016– )

4.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

5.title: The Chamber of the 37 Gods

episode of.title: Bearded Men Presents D&D: The Improvised Campaign (TV Series 2016– )

5.plot: Seeking the fifth element, Ygdrasil, Cade Stormcross is brought to the Mirage Castle, a secret new seat of power for the Illuskin family. He is led there by the family's ancient grand vizier, Cisco. Cade is told that it is his destiny to take the throne, and he wrestles with his philosophies when told that a king is only as evil as he allows himself to become.

6.title: The Tower of Apathy

episode of.title: Bearded Men Presents D&D: The Improvised Campaign (TV Series 2016– )

6.plot: The vampyre hunter has become the vampyre hunted. Vincent Von Dresdner now walks among the undead, serving the vampyre lord Ajax. To fulfill a promise he made to Von Dresdner, noble Clious the Pious set out on a journey to put Vincent out of his misery, and vanquish him from this world, but in so doing, finds himself up against the vampyre lord Ajax himself.

7.title: The Child of Saint Augustine

episode of.title: Bearded Men Presents D&D: The Improvised Campaign (TV Series 2016– )

7.plot: Through an odd twist of fate, Balthasar found himself in the company of three wanderers tasked with protecting the life of the child of Saint Augustine; a small dwarf boy who was turning into...a chicken.

8.title: The Blood of the Wolf

episode of.title: Bearded Men Presents D&D: The Improvised Campaign (TV Series 2016– )

8.plot: The sacred bond of friendship is tested when vampyre lord, Ajax, commands Vincent Von Dresdner to kill Sir Osmont Wolfsbane. In a story of vampyre versus werewolf, the question is, are you team Vincent, or team Osmont? Or are you team Vincemont?

9.title: Welcome to Narcova - Shadow Edition Part 1

episode of.title: Bearded Men Presents D&D: The Improvised Campaign (TV Series 2016– )

9.plot: Adran finds himself stuck in Narcova - Shadow Edition, a bleak world without color, and one that drives its occupants mad after being stuck there for too long. In his journey to escape this shadow world, Adran finds his favorite fancy boy, Toby, previously thought dead, and also an evil wizard pulling the strings of this world - Dracari.

10.title: Curse of the Purple Cold

episode of.title: Bearded Men Presents D&D: The Improvised Campaign (TV Series 2016– )

10.plot: Hired to retrieve a one man's stolen jewel box, Balthasar climbs a purple vine into the skies where there floats a ghost ship that only appears in the twilight known as the Night Ship. On the way, Balthasar encounters Rodolpho, a man from Balthasar's time as a slave, now turned into a goblin by an evil whisper man who siphons peoples' souls into automatons that he uses to do his bidding.

11.title: The Day the Moon Fell

episode of.title: Bearded Men Presents D&D: The Improvised Campaign (TV Series 2016– )

11.plot: In a special crossover to celebrate Geek and Sundry's second anniversary, Bearded Men LA and Robot Teammate team up to tell a tale of mischievous imps and goblins who use song and dance in an attempt to thwart Cade Stormcross and his new pal, Oliver Sweetteeth, all interwoven with musical numbers put on by the musical talents of Robot Teammate. Oh, the pageantry.

12.title: Welcome to Narcova - Shadow Edition Part 2

episode of.title: Bearded Men Presents D&D: The Improvised Campaign (TV Series 2016– )

12.plot: With his mind beginning to crumble in the midst of Narcova - Shadow Edition, Adran scrambles to find his way back to Narcova - Regular Edition, along with the cold and wet, Toby, his favorite fancy boy. But in order for Adran to best the ensorcelling Dracari's evil magicks, our dandy hero must use the goodness from within.

13.title: Madness in the Mouth of the Mountain

episode of.title: Bearded Men Presents D&D: The Improvised Campaign (TV Series 2016– )

13.plot: With a devilish mouth now on his daemonic hand, Draekin travels with a new companion, a potion salesman by the name of Philanderer the Grey, to face down an age-old adversary of chaotic evil proportions.

14.title: Curse of the Dragon's Tear

episode of.title: Bearded Men Presents D&D: The Improvised Campaign (TV Series 2016– )

14.plot: With promises that he has word on the whereabouts of the famed airship, The Beggar's Prize, a villager pleads with pyrate captain Balthasar The Duelist to retrieve an artifact called the Dragon's Tear to protect the well-being of children who have been kidnapped by a group of cultists.

15.title: The Blood Test of Lythandra

episode of.title: Bearded Men Presents D&D: The Improvised Campaign (TV Series 2016– )

15.plot: With his favourite fancy boy, Toby, in tow, Adran embarks on a quest to rescue orphan children from being cooked into meat puff pastries by an evil hag disguised as a harmless old man.

16.title: Questionable Identities

episode of.title: Bearded Men Presents D&D: The Improvised Campaign (TV Series 2016– )

16.plot: With his soul burdened by his family's dark history, Cade, along with two companions, a fisher boy named Finneus, and a werebear named Crispin, must battle his past while being attacked by an order of mercenary shadow monks hired by his brother, King Edward of Illuska.

17.title: A Pyrate's Prize

episode of.title: Bearded Men Presents D&D: The Improvised Campaign (TV Series 2016– )

17.plot: With the unexpected return of his traitorous first mate, Balthasar is faced with the opportunity to forgive Domhnall, now transformed by the evil demigod, Denise. Domhnall seeks redemption by offering Balthasar the way back to his ship, The Beggar's Prize, stolen from him by his former flame, Cynthia.

18.title: A Sojourn with the Bearded Men

episode of.title: Bearded Men Presents D&D: The Improvised Campaign (TV Series 2016– )

18.plot: In a special episode, The Bearded Men address their audience out of character with a meet-and-greet and Q&A.

1.title: The Stone of Poseidon

episode of.title: Bearded Men Presents D&D: The Improvised Campaign (TV Series 2016– )

1.plot: Cade Stormcross goes undercover as a tomato salesman to try to help a small village when an evil sorceress emerges from the ocean's depths to pose a new threat to the townsfolk.

2.title: The Sunken Castle of Hysteria

episode of.title: Bearded Men Presents D&D: The Improvised Campaign (TV Series 2016– )

2.plot: Balthasar escapes capture to hunt for cursed pyrate treasure and seeks an opportunity to commandeer a ship from his enemies.

3.title: Cleansing the Blackmire

episode of.title: Bearded Men Presents D&D: The Improvised Campaign (TV Series 2016– )

3.plot: Adran, and his fancy boy, Toby, go on a quest to stop a necromancer from terrorizing the Blackmire.

4.title: The Curse of the Chaotic Acrobats I

episode of.title: Bearded Men Presents D&D: The Improvised Campaign (TV Series 2016– )

4.plot: Draekin encounters a new travel companion, and try to save a town from the darkness that emanates from a tower, but in the process, they encounter someone who bears a striking resemblance to Draekin's father...

5.title: Voyage to the Sky Castle of Lust

episode of.title: Bearded Men Presents D&D: The Improvised Campaign (TV Series 2016– )

5.plot: After defeating the Yama Yama Jackals, Vincent hunts a deadly vampire who resides in a castle in the sky.

6.title: The Curse of the Chaotic Acrobats II

episode of.title: Bearded Men Presents D&D: The Improvised Campaign (TV Series 2016– )

6.plot: Draekin agrees to join his supposed father, Marad, in an effort to protect Ängalia from the forces of evil, but finds that he has only been duped, and that Marad is actually a demon that has haunted Draekin in the past...

7.title: The Prince, the Pyrate, and the Dancing Owlbear

episode of.title: Bearded Men Presents D&D: The Improvised Campaign (TV Series 2016– )

7.plot: With Balthasar having committed his latest successful act of pyracy, and Cade having taught a young man the art of swordplay, these two make an unlikely pair, as pyrate and prince work together to attempt to break the curse of the Hanged Man...

8.title: The Fight in Between

episode of.title: Bearded Men Presents D&D: The Improvised Campaign (TV Series 2016– )

8.plot: In a twist of fate, Adran runs into his mother who teaches him what it means to be a true hero.

9.title: Chalice of the Unholy Queen

episode of.title: Bearded Men Presents D&D: The Improvised Campaign (TV Series 2016– )

9.plot: Osmont and Vincent battle against Arkon the Mindflayer to stop the daemon from inflicting orphan children with leprosy.

10.title: Shame at the Festival of Lights

episode of.title: Bearded Men Presents D&D: The Improvised Campaign (TV Series 2016– )

10.plot: Bishop went to the humble town of Merbrook to save the Festival of Lights from the terrors of Wicked Kärl, but along the way, he received a very cryptic message from a particularly powerful daemon...

11.title: Here There Be Monsters

episode of.title: Bearded Men Presents D&D: The Improvised Campaign (TV Series 2016– )

11.plot: Balthasar and Adran find themselves in a mysterious tower under the control of an evil succubus.

imdb.title: Bearded Men Presents D&D: The Improvised Campaign
akas: Bearded Men Presents D&D: The Improvised Campaign (United States)
plot: The Bearded Men Los Angeles improv troupe run through a physical, hilarious campaign of Dungeons & Dragons, acting out each of their decisions based on the results of a 20 sided die.
